thread.section_title: The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing!!!
thread.title_full: Amazing!!! - Review of The Manhattan at Times Square Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Soiza99
title: Amazing!!!
text: Great location near to the most attractions, very clean, the rooms are really nice, clean, nice beds, the front desk employees are very professionals and helpful. We arrive early on the morning and they help us with the early check-in. I'm very thankful to Mohammad on the front desk that treat me as a family member. I will repeat this hotel on my next trip to NY...!!!
